# didChangeSize(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells you when the scene’s size has changed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func didChangeSize(_ oldSize: CGSize)
```

```swift
func didChangeSize(_ oldSize: CGSize)
```

## Parameters

- **oldSize**: The old size of the scene, in points.

## Discussion

This method is intended to be overridden in a subclass. Typically, you use this method to adjust the positions of nodes in the scene.

## Responding to Loading and Resizing Events

- **sceneDidLoad()**: Tells you when the scene is presented.
- **willMove(from:)**: Tells you when the scene is about to be removed from a view.
- **didMove(to:)**: Tells you when the scene is presented by a view.
